official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to make permanent the authority for flexible and compressed work schedules for Federal employees, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Measures passed House, amended) Amends the Federal Employees Flexible and Compressed Work Schedules Act of 1982 to make permanent the authority of Federal agencies to use flexible and compressed work schedules. Provides for computing the premium pay of employees on such schedules in the event such schedules conflict with a Federal holiday.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to make permanent the authority for flexible and compressed work schedules for Federal employees, and for other purposes.
